scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate; cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon index.js
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate; cross-env NODE_ENV=production nodemon index.js
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate; cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --inspect index.js
